8.verification_summary: Using Itos formula for df with f depending on x and dx = a(x) dt + b(x) dW yields df = [f' a + 1/2 f'' b^2] dt + f' b dW; setting f' b = beta and solving for a gives a equals (alpha over beta) times b plus (1/2) b times derivative of b, which matches the claimed condition
